content:
### Bug fixes

* **core**: fixed an issue that was causing n8n to apply authentication checks, even when user management was disabled.
* **core**: n8n now skips credentials checks for disabled nodes.
* **editor**: fix a bug affecting touchscreen monitors.
* [HubSpot node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.hubspot.md): fix for search operators.
* [SendGrid node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.sendgrid.md): fixed an issue with sending attachments.
* [Wise node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.wise.md): respect the time parameter on `get: exchangeRate`.
